2024.context: Palantir Technologies Inc. is a data analytics and AI platform company focused on government intelligence, commercial analytics, and AI operations. AIP (AI Platform) driving commercial growth. Defense AI.

competitors.name: Databricks
competitors.notes: Leader in AI/ML development, 60% YoY revenue growth in Q3 2024, projected to exceed $3B ARR by end of 2025, 16.49% market share in big data analytics, unified data lakehouse for generative AI

competitors.name: Snowflake
competitors.notes: Strong traction with unified data lakehouse, generative AI capabilities, and consumption-based pricing resonating with commercial clients
